<color=#ffffff>Quel dommage que vous ayez annulé notre contrat. </color>
<color=#ffffff>C'est vraiment malheureux que vous ayez décidé d'annulé notre contrat. </color>
<color=#ffffff>Nous nous attendions pas à ce que vous annulez notre contrat ! </color>
Vous n'avez emême pas essayé de travailler sur notre contrat ! Vous n'avez pas idée d'à quel point c'est important et combien d'argent nous avons perdu ?!

Maintenant vous devrez nous payer 5 fois plus qu'on étais censé vous payer pour compenser nos pertes. Attendez vous a ce qu'on dise à toute l'industrie que vous êtes un menteur et que vous n'êtes pas digne de confiance !
<color=#ffffff>Vous étiez presque à court de temps pour notre contrat, mais nous sommes heureux que vous ayez pu le rendre à temps ! </color>
Merci pour votre rapiditée d'execution sur notre contrat ! Nous apprécions que vous ayez pu finir aussi vite.
Malheureusement les composant {0} ne sont pas fini ! {1}
<color=#ffffff>Maintenant nous deverons trouver quelqu'un d'autre pour faire le travail à votre place. </color>
<color=#ffffff>Maintenant nous deverons recruter quelqu'un d'autre pour finir votre travail ! </color>
<color=#ffffff>Vous avez implémenté toutes les fontionnalitées que nous avons demandé. </color>
<color=#ffffff>Vous avez implémenté toutes les fontionnalitées que nous demandions ! </color>
Nous n'avons trouvé aucun problèmes avec votre travail, vous avez fait du très bon travail !
Nous n'avons pas pu trouver de problèmes avec votre travail, vous avez fait du très bon travail !
Nous n'avons trouvé aucun problèmes avec votre travail, donc vous avez fait un travail magnifique !
<color=#ffffff>Vous êtes chanceux. Ce projet n'étais pas très important pour nous donc nous vous donnons aucune pénalitées cette fois-ci. </color>
<color=#ffffff>Étant donnée que ce projet n'étais pas important pour nous nous vous donnons aucune pénialitées cette fois-ci. </color>
<color=#ffffff>Étant donnée que ce projet n'étais pas ci important pour nous nous vous donnons aucune pénialitées cette fois-ci. </color>

Pour celà vous allez nous payer une compensation de {0}$ pour couvrir nos dépenses.

Nous avons trouvé {0} bugs ans votre projet que vous deverez réparer vous même.

There are some additional components in the project that we didn't order in our commission. </color>
Not all of them were finished, so we decided to remove them from it.
However, they fit perfectly into it and we decided to leave them there.
However, they fit perfectly into it so we decided to leave them there.
They are very well made so we will definitely use them in our other projects!
They are very well made so we will definitely use them in our future projects!
However, they are usless for us because you didn't finished the ones that we requested!

Ça a dépassé nos attentes les plus folles et par concéquent nous avons décidé de vous payer l'équivalent de cinq fois la rémunération initiale pour votre succès extraordinaire ! Nous espérons faire de nouvelles collaborations avec vous dans le futur.

Le manager de notre entreprise étais si satisfait qu'il a décidé de vous payer 5x la rémunération originale pour votre succèes époustouflant! Nous espérons plus de collaborations avec vous dans le futur.
Nous sommes si satisfaits avec les résultat que nous avons décidé de vous donner une récommense additionelle de 5x la rémunération originale pour votre incroyable succès !

It has exceeded our wildest expectations and therefore we decided to pay you the five times of original payment for your extraordinary achievement + bonus of {0}$ for additional components! We hope for future collaboration with you.

La recherche à échouée ! Malheureusement, vous n'avez pas été capable de trouver un employé qui corresponde à vos critères. Repensez aux critères qui devrait être ajusté et recommencer. Conseil : Souvenez vous que certains crières de recherche peuvent ne pas être compatibles avec d'autres et par conséquent ne vous permette pas de trouver le bon candidat. Par exemple, plus le niveau de l'employé est élevé, plus ses statistiques seront élevés. Prenez ça en considération losque vous choisirez votre prochain critère de recherche. Si vous n'êtes pas sûr à propos de la correlation entre les différents paramètres, Cela serait une bonne idée de sélectionné des critères imprécis qui vous permettrait d'en apprendre plus sur eux.

Les ventes ont été faibles mais apparement vous avez gagné beaucoup plus que prévus avec ce projet - {0}$ ! Cela peut être lié à vos dépenses de management ou à la qualité de votre projet. Dommage qu'il n'est pas eu plus de diffusion sur le marché, mais cela est tout de même un très gros succès finnancier. {1}
Les ventes ont été nominales mais grâce aux faibles coût de production vous avez gagné {0}$ ce qui est un très bon résultat. {1}
Les ventes ont été normales et le projet à gagné une assez grande diffusion. Grâce à votre management de production et son faible coût vous avez gagné un énorme montant de {0}$ ! {1}
Cela a été un énorme succès. vous avez fait beaucoup plus de ventes que prévus et parce que vous n'avez pas beaucoup dépensé pour ce projet vous avez finis par gagné un étonnant montant de {0}$ ! {1}
C'est juste incroyable ! Ce projet a été un incroyable succès et au delà de nos espérances. vous avez gagné un incroyable montant d'argent - {0}$ ! {1}

Les ventes ont été faibles mais apparement vous avez gagné beaucoup plus que prévus avec ce projet - {0}$ ! Cela peut être lié à vos dépenses de management ou à la qualité de votre projet. Dommage qu'il n'est pas eu plus de diffusion sur le marché, mais cela est tout de même un un succès financier. {1}

Les ventes ont été nominales et vous avez finis par gagné {0}$. Bien que cela ait été un projet ordinaire cela aura été une bonne leçon qui vous aura fait apprendre une chose ou deux. Grâce à lui les prochains seront bien meilleurs !
Les ventes ont été normales et le projet à gagné une assez grande diffusion. Vos gains ont été nominal cependant vous avez gagné {0}$ ! {1}
Cela a été un énorme succès. Les ventes ont été beaucoup plus importante que prévu et vous avez finis par gagné {0}$ ! Compte tenu du succès du projet, le profit est cependant assez faible. {1}

C'est juste incroyable ! Ce projet a été un incroyable succès et bien au delà de nos espérances. Vous avez été capable de gagné {0}$ ! Celà peut paraître exceptionnel, mais compte tenu de la diffusion de ce projet, le profit n'est pas accablant. {1}
Sales were quite low though. Apparently this project was not needed on the market. Fortunetly you were able to earn something from it and at the end you've got {0}$! {1}
The sales were nominal, though they could have been higher bacause we didn't earn much - only {0}$. {1}
The sales were above normal and the project gained some spread. Unfortunetly it was bearly enough to cover you expenses so you ended up earning only {0}$! {1}

It was a huge success. The sales were far beyond normal! Unfortunetly it was bearly enough to cover your expenses so you ended up earning only {0}$! Considering project success the profit is very low! {1}

And that's just insane! Although this project was an enormous success you didn't earned much on it! It was bearly enough to cover your expenses so you ended up earning only {0}$! You must look into spending details and cut some of it off. Otherwise you won't be able to earn anything if your next project is not as successful as this one!
Unfortunately, it wasn't the success you hoped for. You didn't manage to break through the competition and eventually you lost {0}$! {1}
The sales were normal, but unfortunately that didn't help you to make any money off this project and eventually you lost {0}$! {1}
The sales were above normal, but unfortunately it didn't help you earn anything on this project so at the end you lost {0}$! {1}
Although it was a huge commercial success it didn't pay off and you lost {0}$! {1}

And that's just insane! Although this project was enormous success you didn't earned anything on it. In face you've lost {0}$! You must look into your spendings and check what went wrong! This cannot happen again!
Note: Your market position is not strong enough to create and publish your own projects effectively. Do some commissions first to get fans who will be eager to buy your next projects!
Keep up the good work and congratulations on your success! It's a good time to pop some corks and celebrate!
Congratulations on your success! Keep up the good work and surely your next project will be as successful as this one!
You can be pround of yourself! Take some well deserved rest and celebrate on your success.
Now it's time to celebrate! Grab some good drink and just chillout. You definitely deserved it!
Try to reduce production costs in order to make future projects more profitable.
Try to reduce production costs so it could be better.
Make sure to look into your spendings and try to reduce as much of it as possible.
Think about what went wrong, check project spendings and make corrections that will help you in the future.
Think about how to reduce costs of production.
Remember to look into your spendings and try to reduce production costs.
To make projects more successful upgrade your skills and make sure that you don't just use the simplest ones.
In order to make projects more successful try to updagre your skills and use to most advanced ones. They are widely demanded on the market.
To increase chances of bigger success make sure you use the most advanced and upgraded components.
Make sure to use the most advanced and upgraded components. They are widely demanded on the market so chances for success are bigger.

Furnitures bought on company get 100% refund when sold but they will be taken by the bailiff in case of company bankruptcy
New Furniture Unlocked! Following furnitures have been unlocked:
You can check them out in the Build Mode.

This revolutionary darkwood desk was made by our skilled workers. Everything is done with great care and thought. Our little hands have worked out the smallest details in this desk, hoping for the best possible comfort of customers. Everything has been made from recycled noble wood, so there is no chance of any breakage or rapid worn-out.

And here it is! A refreshed version of our iconic furniture. This desk is able to accommodate two monitors at the same time and not collapse! This is a great success of our company and therefore the price has been raised accordingly. Used metal inserts have been colored with pastel crayons so that they do not stand out from dark wood. The design of this desk has been assessed by numerous foreign buyers as almost good!

A solid desk made from scratch especially for this kind of monitors, really! It's not at all that this is the previous model that is sold for the second time under a different name. We're sure you'll like our desk, and if not, it's your problem. We don't accept returns.

It is a model for picky people, but definitely worthy of recommendation. It has its flaws and imperfections, however, the top was made of a solid, wooden board, which will certainly not fall apart soon... Although we do not guarantee that.

This is by far the most advanced desk in our offer. I don't know how, but it is capable of accommodating two huge 16:9 monitors! It was probably enchanted by our company's great magician. Please handle it respectfully.

This tall shelf made of the darkwood is a great purchase for long winter nights! You can keep things on it, from books to your collection of ropes. And when it gets to its end, it's working perfectly as firewood for your fireplace!

Have you ever wanted to have a tall, white shelf to store your books and toys? Now is your chance to get one! We present you with our latest shelfs collection. It's all white, like milk! You like milk, right? We reassure you that no cow suffered during the production of this fantastic piece of furniture.

The high, big shelf made of the darkwood is a great purchase for long winter nights! You can keep things on it, from books to a cage with annoying neighbor’s dog. And when it gets to its end, it's working perfectly as firewood for your fireplace!

I'm sure you once thought to yourself, "Hmm… It would be really cool to have a white, big and high shelf..." Now is your chance to get one! We present you with our latest shelfs collection. It's all white, like milk! You like milk, right? We reassure you that no cow suffered during the production of this fantastic piece of furniture.

This dark wood wardrobe will provide space for all of your clothes, including leather, glans and chains for concerts. And if you don't like metal, you can always put your pets' clothes there, or your neighbours' pets' clothes...

This is the smallest shelf in our white collection. But don't let its size fool you. It's so spacious that it can even fit your entire Steam Library in there! It's all white, like milk! You like milk, right? We reassure you that no cow suffered during the production of this fantastic piece of furniture.
It's just a red rose... The same one you'd like to give to your beloved ones hoping to spend the rest of your life with them... Unfortunately, you are a programmer...
A white lily, supposedly a sign of tidiness... Is that why you buy it? You better start cleaning up! Plants won’t help you with keeping off the dust!
Lavender that has a very nice smell. When there's enough of it, it can cover up bad smells, like your whole week scent for example. But it also looks nice in the room.
Sunflower is a plant that always turns towards the sun. However, thanks to our revolutionary technology of non-genetic engineering, we have managed to modify it so that it always stay the same way!

This compact misty shower provides water without any worries. It ensures the right level of cleanliness and an overwhelming amount of water. There is enough of it for at least three people! The rustproof frame makes the cabin resistant to aging. The Misty Shower is ideal for any kind of creature, even unicorns!

Built on ancient engineering principles such as gravity and fluid dynamics, the HBB toilet has become the basis of modern hygiene and efficiency. Wastewater is drained away quickly and the siphon stops almost all unpleasant odors before they return to the room. The ingeniously opening toilet seat and the flush handle make using the toilet easier than ever before. Hunt down your own HBB now!
Simple bathroom sink with hot AND cold water control, handy soap dish, and wide basin. It is designed to serve as a place to wash your hands, so please do not use it as a bathtub.

This simple white fridge allows you to store food with both short and long shelf-life, extending it by a few hours, days, weeks, years and so on. The patented gas technology produces only a minimal amount of carbon monoxide. The product comes with shelves, drawers, doors and a small dwarf that if not fed, will be disobedient, which can lead to numerous complications.

Tired of cold food and summer decoration? Nothing warms the kitchen like a white oven! The exciting dual-fuel design allows this wonder to be used with both the explosive power of natural gas and innovative electric currents. You can use it to heat up your pre-cooked meals or prepare your own!

Are you tired of getting your hands dirty and washing plates after yourself? Now you have the solution! Buy the latest NRE dishwasher to save yourself the trouble. The innovative triple-drying technology invented by our creative team of housewives is perfect for everyday life. Just pack it in, put the cube in, and fire! With this device you will start a completely new relationship with your dishwashing!
A kitchen worktop with two lockers will provide space for all your pots, pans or bowls, and after dark, it makes a brilliant place to hide in the hide-and-seek game.
The kitchen worktop with three drawers is ideal for all cutlery, knives, lighters, needles, threads, tasers, machine guns, or candles for the cake. "Who knows what can be useful in the kitchen?"
A simple piece of kitchen worktop together with its casing, made of solid plywood will serve you for many years! Unless you jump on it. Don't jump on your worktop.
White Worktop with Two Lockers and Sink
You can't miss it in the kitchen, a perfect place to relax, throw away all your negative emotions, invent winning situations, challenge social constructs and wash plates.
Darkwood Kitchen Table with Four Chairs

A darkwood kitchen table with four chairs is ideal for any home! Seemingly small but big, narrow but wide. Scientists to this day cannot understand how it can accommodate a 12-person party. It still remains a secret of our company.
Lightwood Kitchen Table with Four Chairs

A lightwood wood kitchen table with four chairs is ideal for any home! Seemingly small but big, narrow but wide. Scientists to this day cannot understand how it can accommodate a 12-person party. It still remains a secret of our company.
A magnificent, beautiful, majestic, red just like the blood of all OUR enemies carpet, worth all the money.
A darkwood commode that fits perfectly in your living room. Spacious, wide, perfect for the big TV you plan to buy in the near future, right? I mean, you must finally start watching TVPeace!
A lightwood commode is a perfect match for the living room.  Spacious, wide, perfect for the big TV you plan to buy in the near future, right? I mean, you must finally start watching TVPeace!

A darkwood commode with an old TV will keep you entertained for years to come! Black and white TV, spanish soap operas, loud buzzing speakers, and no remote control, just like in the good, old times. In addition, we throw in a few books in Javanese and free, unlimited access to TVPeace.

A lightwood commode with an old TV will keep you entertained for years to come! Black and white TV, spanish soap operas, loud buzzing speakers, and no remote control, just like in the good, old time. In addition, we throw in a few books in Javanese and free, unlimited access to TVPeace.
The red modern carpet is a perfect idea to buy either for your living room or bedroom. It keeps the dust out and looks great on the floor. It's easy to use, just lay it down and you can wallow.
The grey modern carpet is a perfect idea to buy either for your living room or bedroom. It keeps the dust out and looks great on the floor. It's easy to use, just lay it down and you can wallow.

This is a chair. A darkwood chair. You can use it to sit on it or to tie someone up. But remember to always have a safeword. And today's safeword is… BSOD! Because you are a programmer… And you will never use it…

This is a chair. A lightwood chair. You can use it to sit on it or to tie someone up. But remember to always have a safeword. And today's safeword is… BSOD! Because you are a programmer… And you will never use it…

Allows you to correctly switch and display your mobile application when the device is held horizontally.

User interface, which focuses on the greatest possible intuitiveness of its functionality.
User interface, which focuses on ensuring that new users don't have problems with using your application.
Allows users to purchase virtual goods for a small amount of money directly in the application.

This will allow you to spread your wings in the industry, hire employees and create and publish your own projects. It will also allow you to buy many upgrades that will optimize your work and provide many additional bonuses. To confirm the founding of your company go to the Company Manager, choose a name and take your career to the next level!

You are in debts! Hi! Unfortunately, your character has fallen into debt, which you are not able to cover even with funds from your company account. If you don't resolve the situation quickly your company will be dissolved. Try to do some commissions, sell some furniture or reduce expenses in order to stay in business.

You are in debts! Hi! Unfortunately, your character has fallen into debt. Luckily, you managed to borrow some money from your friends and family to continue your work. Try to do some commissions, sell some furniture or reduce your expenses in order to stay in business.

Company dissolved! Hi! Unfortunately, you have not been able to find a way to cover your character's debts, which forced you to dissolve your company. But don't worry, you've managed to get the money for a fresh start. Try to analyze what mistakes you have made and what needs to be corrected so that this situation does not happen again.
Your company is on the deficit!

Company on deficit! Oh no! Your company bank account is on a deficit! If this situation persists for the next 3 months, the bailiff will be forced to seize the company's property and it will be dissolved. Try to reverse the situation, minimize costs and increase profits so that it does not lead to bankruptcy.

Company is in debts! Unfortunetly, you weren't able to make your company profitable in this month! Remember that if this situation persist for three more months your company will be shutdown by bailiff!
Company is still in debts! This is the second month in a row when the company hasn't been able to make any profit. And your debt is growing. Better do something about it or it will be over soon!
Company is in serious debts! This is your last chance! If your company doesn't make any profit this month, it will mean bankruptcy and it all be over.
Company went bankrupt! Unfortunately, it happened. The bailiff took all of the company's property, and it was dissolved. Analyze the situation, check what went wrong to avoid mistakes in future.

Thank you so much for buying our game! We hope you'll have a lot of fun playing it! Here is a quick tutorial on how to play. Chapters: {0} Use arrows below to move between tutorial stages or close it by clicking "X". You can come back here any time by clicking "?" in the top left corner. To return to this chapter click on DevLife Tutorial.

Welcome to DevLife! Here are some basic camera controls: - Hold RMB - Rotate Camera - Scroll - Zoom Camera - WSAD - Move Camera - Left Shift - Speed-up Camera You can also use arrows on your keyboard: - Arrow Up / Down - Zoom Camera - Arrow Left / Right - Rotate Camera Horizontally - Left Alt + Arrow Up / Down - Rotate Camera Vertically Press F6 to toggle cinematic camera: - E / Q - Move Camera Up / Down - Left Shift - Slow Down Camera - F7 - Take Screenshot
The very first step you should take is assigning you character to the workstation. Click on the Workstation Tracker and then select your employee.
Thanks to Workstation Trackers you can manage your employees, create new projects and learn new skills. Remember that employee must be assign to workstation to be able to create projects.

Although you've already selected three skills for your character you cannot use them to create projects. First you must learn how to use them. You have two options to do that: - Buy one of the courses available in the Workstation Tracker -> Learning - Create learning project in the Workstation Tracker -> New Project -> Learning Then choose skill you want to learn. You need to learn at least one skill by buying a course and complete at least one learning project to proceed.

In DevLife you have many options to customize and upgrade your working space. To do that you need to enter the Build Mode by clicking on it's icon in the bottom panel. Location furnishings and its appearance directly affects the mood of your employees and the effectiveness of their work. It's worth making sure that your workspace looks as good as possible! To place a furniture just Drag and Drop it into the available space. Many furnitures have variants which you can choose by clicking RMB on the furniture button to pin the furniture information. If you want to sell furniture press X on your keyboard while dragging it. Use Q and E to rotate the furniture.

In order to create and publish your own projects you will need to create a company. In addition for them to be effective, you'll need to have a large fan base that is willing to buy your product. At the beginning, commissions for external clients will have to be enough for you. To unlock commissions searches you must learn at least one skill by buying a course and complete at least one learning project. First of all you need to search the market for appropriate commissions. Open the Commissions Search window, select commissions search criteria, start the search and then select employee to perform the search. Tip: At the beginning of the game it's advisable to select the "Only Unlocked" option. To be able to select more criteria you will need to upgrade your company. Also remember that some search criteria may be incompatible with each other and therefore prevent you from finding the right commissions.

After you perform successful commissions search you will get a message with the results.

Click on the messages button, then open the message with the search results. Next select the comissions you are interested in doing.

It is good idea to select only one commision on the beginning of your adventure.

When you accept commission you need to create new project. To do that click Create Project Button in the Commission Panel or Workstation Tracker -> New Project -> Commercial. In the Project Creator window you need to select all components that are required in the commission. You can also add more components, create your own project (to do that deselect commission) or a learning one.

To start working on a component you need to click on it and assign one of your employees to start creating it. There are many variables that affect the speed of programming. The most important ones are: - Employee Stats - Employee Mood - Component Level - Component Advancement There is a chance of your employee thinking about solution to a problem in his component. This chance decreases with the component level. There is one more thing that you need to be aware of - Employee Energy. Each action performed by employee requires energy. It regenerates with time, but if you overwork your employee he will need to go to a vacation. You can add Employee Energy by clicking Wokrstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy

There is one very important thing that you need to be aware of - Employee Energy. Each action performed by employee requires energy. It regenerates with time, but if you overwork your employee he will need to go to a vacation. You can add Employee Energy by clicking Wokrstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy Option for sending employee for a vacation is in the same tab.

At any point during working on a project you can decide to end it. However, remember that if it's not finished it will have it's repercussions.

If your project is from a commission then you need to finish it before the deadline pass. If you don't make it in time you will get a penalty from commissioner.

Report after each project is available in the Messages window.

After your employee gains enough experience he will advanced to the next level. Each level gives you one skill point which you can use to unlock new skills or upgrade the old ones. To spend your skill points click on the corresponding notification or use Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Skills If you decide to upgrade your skill it will instantly advance on the next level. Remeber that newly bought skill won't be available in projects until you upgrade / learn them on at least 1 level. They also won't increase your employee stats.

The most important goal of the game is to create and manage your own company. To do that you must first finish at least one commission successfully and then meet the required conditions listed in the Create Company panel. Creating company is crucial to unlocking new options and progressing in the game. Thanks to it you will be able to hire more employees and unlock many bonuses that will improve your work. More on that in the Company Upgrades tutorial stage.

To help you with upgrading your company from time to time you will recive goals for your company. You can access the list of Company Goals by hovering over it's icon or by clicking on it to keep it visible all the time. You will get additional money and company Upgrade Points for fulfilling this goals.

In the finance panel you will find all information about your money. After creating your company you will be able to transfer money between your accounts and take bigger loans. To unlock better loans you will first have to unlock corresponding upgrades in the Company Upgrades. More on that in the next tutorial stage.

To access Company Upgrades you can click on the corresponding notification or open your Company Manager -> Company Upgrades. You can select from many upgrades from different categories. Almost every upgrade has it's levels which increase given bonus. To unlock / upgrade one of the upgrades you need to have Company Upgrade Points. You can earn them by finishing Company Goals or leveling your company.

Creating company allows you to hire more employees. The whole process of searching for employees is very similar to searching commissions. Choose search criteria, assign employee to perform the search and at the end see the message with the results. Every location has the maximum number of employees which you can have at the time. In first location you can hire only one additional employee. If you want to hire more, you'll have to buy new location. More on that in the next tutorial stage. If you decide that you don't need your employees anymore you can fire them in the Employees Manager. There you will also find more information about the employees you hire. Tip: Remember that some search criteria may be incompatible with each other and therefore prevent you from finding the right candidate.

In current version of the game there are two locations: Family House - your current location and City Center Office. You can travel between location by clicking on the floating arrow at the edge of each map. Every location has it's bonuses but also costs and bills. To see them you need to zoom out the camera to show Location Trackers. There you can find all information about the location and buy it. In the future there will be planty of new locations available for you to explore! That's the end of tutorial! You can come back here any time by clicking "?" in the top left corner.
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir annuler le Tutoriel Interactif ?

Bienvenue dans DevLife ! Merci beaucoup d'avoir acheté notre jeu ! Nous espérons que vous aurez du plaisir à y jouer ! Afin de vous faciliter la tâche, nous vous avons préparé ce court tutoriel interactif, dans lequel vous apprendrez les bases de la mécanique du jeu. Pour démarrer le tutoriel interactif, cliquez sur le bouton "Allons-y". Vous savez comment jouer ? Si oui, vous pouvez passer le tutoriel et passer directement au jeu. En cas de problème, vous pouvez utiliser le tutoriel textuel disponible après avoir cliqué sur l'icône "?" dans le coin supérieur gauche de votre écran.

Apprentissage Même si votre personnage possède déjà trois compétences que vous avez choisies lors de la création du personnage, elles ne peuvent pas être utilisées dans des projets. Pour changer cela, vous devez d'abord les apprendre. Il y a trois façons de le faire dans le jeu : - Acheter des cours - Créer des projets d'apprentissage - Se mettre à niveau avec des points de compétences Dans ce tutoriel, nous allons vous montrer les deux premières options. Suivez les flèches visibles sur votre écran pour continuer.

Contrôle du temps Une fois que vous avez commencé à apprendre une compétence, vous devez attendre un certain temps que votre personnage ait terminé le cours sélectionné. Pour accélérer ce processus, utilisez les touches de 1 à 4, ou cliquez sur les flèches en haut de l'écran. Pour mettre le jeu en pause, appuyez sur Éspace ou sur le bouton Pause, qui se trouve également en haut de votre écran.

Créer des projets La deuxième façon d'acquérir de nouvelles compétences est de créer des projets d'apprentissage. En plus de ceux-ci, il est également possible de créer des projets à partir de contrat, et à l'avenir, après la création de votre entreprise, également des projets entièrement personnel! Suivez les flèches pour ouvrir le Créateur de projet et procéder.

Créer des projets Pour attribuer un composant au projet, cliquez dessus avec Clique Gauche ou faites-le glisser vers le panneau Composants sélectionnés. Créez votre premier projet d'apprentissage pour continuer.

Assigner des employés aux composants Une fois le projet créé, il apparaîtra sur le côté droit de l'écran. Pour commencer à travailler sur ces composants, vous devez leur assigner des employés. Pour se faire, cliquez sur le composant et sélectionnez ensuite un employé dans la liste. Suivez les flèches visibles sur votre écran pour continuer.

Fin du projet À tout moment après avoir créé un projet, vous pouvez terminer le travail sur celui-ci en cliquant sur le bouton "Publier". Rappelez-vous, cependant, que dans le cas de contrat et de vos propres projets commerciaux, le taux de réussite du projet affectera son résultat. Terminer le projet d'apprentissage pour continuer.

Premier Contrat Vous avez acquis une certaine expérience et vous savez comment créer des éléments de base. Il est temps de rechercher votre premier contrat. Ouvrez la fenêtre de recherche des contrats pour continuer.

Recherche de Contrat Il existe dans DevLife de nombreux critères de recherche pour les contrats. Le plus important d'entre eux est "Seulement débloqué", qui vous fournira uniquement les contrat que vous pouvez compléter à un moment donné. Pour continuer, commencez une nouvelle recherche de contrat avec l'option "Seulement débloqué" cochée.

Assigner un employé à la recherche Tout comme pour le travail sur les composants, vous devez assigner un de vos employés pour continuer la recherche. Cliquez sur la recherche de contrats et sélectionnez ensuite un employé dans la liste pour continuer.

<Environnement de travail Notez que chaque action que votre personnage effectue, il perd de l'énergie. Une fois ce tutoriel terminé, vous pourrez augmenter sa quantité dans le Personnage -> Employé -> Ajouté Énergie Contrôlez le niveau d'énergie visible sous la forme d'une barre verte au-dessus du personnage et laissez vos employés se reposer de temps en temps. Si l'énergie de l'employé est à une faible valeur pendant une longue période, ils seront surchargés de travail. Vous pouvez résoudre ce problème en les envoyant en vacances. Cette option est également disponible dans l'onglet Employé. Complétez la recherche de contrats en cours pour continuer.

Tutoriel interactif terminé! Vous avez terminé votre première recherche de contrat et donc ce Tutoriel interactif. Vous connaissez déjà les bases du jeu DevLife et grâce à cela votre carrière dans l'industrie informatique peut continuer ! Votre prochain objectif sera d'accepter et de remplir votre premier contrat. Vous trouverez les récompenses de la recherche dans le panneau des tâches, qui est disponible dans le coin supérieur gauche sous l'icône de la cloche. En cas de problème, vous pouvez toujours utiliser le tutoriel textuel disponible en cliquant sur l'icône "?" juste au-dessus du bouton des tâches. Bonne chance !

Depuis quelque temps, vous sentez en vous que votre fin est proche... Votre corps s'est affaibli de plus en plus, mais vous avez toujours eu la sérénité et la volonté de travailler. Mais ce moment devait arriver, vous êtes mort. Votre aventure dans le monde de l'informatique est terminée. Nous espérons qu'en regardant le passé, vous êtes satisfait du déroulement de la vie de votre développeur. Merci beaucoup d'avoir joué à DevLife et d'avoir survécu jusqu'au bout. Si vous voyez ce message, nous sommes vraiment surpris que vous ayez eu assez de constipation pour en arriver là, surtout dans l'état actuel du jeu :P Dans la version actuelle, la mort de votre personnage survient à un âge prédéterminé, plus avancé, et n'affecte pas votre gameplay. Vous pouvez facilement poursuivre le jeu, mais nous ne garantissons pas qu'il sera stable. À l'avenir, cependant, il vous appartiendra de décider quand votre aventure se terminera, en prenant des décisions dans différents événements. Nous espérons que vous vous en réjouirez. Merci encore d'avoir joué ! :)
Roman Studio

Meilleurs voeux pour vos 18 ans ! Vous entrez dans le prochain mode de vie indépendant. Votre fête d'anniversaire a été forte et très réussie. Tu as passé un bon moment avec tes amis et ta famille. C'était vraiment une soirée inoubliable ! Vous avez également reçu pas mal de cadeaux qui vous permettront d'entrer dans l'âge adulte avec un peu plus d'argent. Mais pour que les choses restent réelles, vos parents arrêteront de vous envoyer de l'argent pour couvrir vos factures. Dorénavant, tu devras payer pour vivre. D'autre part, vous pourrez enfin réaliser votre rêve et démarrer votre entreprise! Le monde vous est désormais ouvert. Ne le gaspillez pas !
Bienvenue à la Version Test de DevLife !

Bienvenue à la version pré-lancement de DevLife ! Si vous lisez ce message, vous faites partie des personnes incroyablement chanceuse qui ont la chance d'être lancé dans un travail d'esclave et dur pour tester ce jeu. Bien sûr, vous n'obtiendrez rien en échange, qu'en pensez-vous ? Dans le coin supérieur gauche de votre écran se trouve un tutoriel rapide sur la façon de jouer à ce jeu et sur les fonctionnalités disponibles dans cette version. Si vous trouvez un bug allez sur mésotegames.com/bugsreport et envoyez-nous des captures d'écran, des vidéos ou une liste d'étapes pour recréer le problème ;) Và travailler, esclave ! Jakub 'Theromanek100' Kiryluk
